alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 5:32AM PST until January 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Widespread fog, with areas of visibility below one half of a mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley, including Eugene, Corvallis, Salem and Albany. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures near freezing in spots south of Salem, there may be some patchy icy spots, especially on rural roads and bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Slow down, and watch for pedestrians, especially in urban areas and near schools.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley
